Summary: it was a bright object, star like and hovering in the sky.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Newport Beach

This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailswe were sitting poolside in newport beach last Sunday after dinner. i noticed a very bright object in the sky just hovering. it looked like a star which would glow very bright then dim slightly. it was about north east. i think it was just a mylar ballon, but it was not really moving in a direction. we watched it for about an hour and the light emitted from it didnt change. i took a few pictures and increased the object to 400% and one off them looks like a disk. ive attached the pictures, im sure its explainable. the object is a small dot above the palm. ted you can contact me thru email
